channel.title: Comments on: ACT HDSS Clutch & Prolite Flywheel

item.title: By: Custom Bracket + Stainless Braided Clutch Line | Grand Mighty
item.dc:creator: Custom Bracket + Stainless Braided Clutch Line | Grand Mighty
item.description: […] I installed a stainless braided clutch line. For the third time. Back when I had the ACT clutch installed by PR Motorsports, I asked them to throw on a clutch line that I bought years ago for my […]

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2012/11/act-hdss-clutch-prolite-flywheel/#comment-42746">Kent</a>.
Nice, how long has your clutch lasted you so far?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Kent.

Nice, how long has your clutch lasted you so far?

item.title: By: Kent
item.dc:creator: Kent
item.description: I believe I have the same clutch. my setup is only different because I have the Racing Beat flywheel instead. +1 for performance and comfort!
item.content:encoded: I believe I have the same clutch. my setup is only different because I have the Racing Beat flywheel instead. +1 for performance and comfort!
